headline: Politically Georgia: Why Herschel Walker is stiff arming GOP debates
author: Greg Bluestein
sentences: In this edition of the Politically Georgia podcast, host Greg Bluestein is joined by AJC managing editor Leroy Chapman to breakdown the Senate race, the contest for governor and what bills could gain traction before Crossover Day.
So why is Herschel Walker using this stage to say that hell bypass showdowns against his Republican rivals?
Its qualifying week at the Gold Dome so its time for candidates to make official their intentions.
